about_the_game:
Demons Infernalize

Shoot fireballs, slash with lasers, detonate bombs! Burn and destroy!
Use your abilities to destroy the ice monsters attacking the Demon Lands!
Build your character and count on your abilities to survive. How long can you survive?


Become the Demon!

Have fun with minimalist gameplay and the following mechanics:

*Build your character in game
*Slash the ice foes and get experience
*Heal by burning the objects
*Find treasures to earn gold to upgrade your character


Gain the Abilities
*Area Bombing
*Auto Shoot
*Barrier
*Bombs
*4 Way Shooter
*Lava Lake
*Meltdown
*Rotating Daggers
*Shocker

Build Your Upgrades
*Max Hearts
*Damage Bonus
*Move Speed Bonus
*Cool Down Reduction
*Collection Distance Bonus
